author: wn.com
title: Public Notice on the Tariff Review (NERC - Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission)
text: ( Source : NERC - Nigerian Electricity Regulatory Commission ) The Electric Power Sector Reform Act 2005 grants the Commission the power to establish the tariff which all classes of customers should pay for electricity services. Section 76
